actions.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment requires chairmen of committees to obtain either the agreement of the ranking minority member or the approval of a majority of committee members before waiving the seven-day prior notice requirement for conducting hearings.
purpose: An amendment to require the chairmen of committees to obtain either the agreement of the ranking minority member or the approval of a majority of committee members before waiving the seven-day prior notice requirement for conducting hearings.
